#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
 int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
     while(t--)
    {
     cout<<"\n";
     int *a;
     unsigned long long int k,n,sum=0;
     cin>>n>>k;
    
     int i;
     a= new int[n];
     for(i=0;i<n;i++)
     {
       cin>>a[i];
     }
     
     sort(a,a+n);
     reverse(a,a+n);
     for(i=0;i<k;i++)
     {
       sum=sum+a[i];
     }
     cout<<sum<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
